Posts.Content: Hi - I finished chemo last June and yes I have some joint pain but its mainly in my legs.You might want to let your doctor know so he can rule out anything elsa.I am also on tamoxifen which im not happy about because of the side effects but as you know have no choice.Have you had any problems while taking this drug?Hope to hear from you and hope you find some answers.
Posts.Title: pain after treatment

Posts.Content: HI,I'm not the one you were chatting with but I saw you were from michigan and I am too.Was wondering where abouts?I'm in Muskegon and have breast cancer and would love to hear from others who live close by me.If you get a chance please e-mail me:miraclemom12632001@yahoo.com thank you and hope you find that person you were looking for. Lori
